title: I Read Ridiculous eBay Tech Ads
description: - You asked for a Part 3, so here's Part 3! A little shorter this time, but I've got big plans for Part 4. Hope you enjoy.  PATREON:  TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:   Subscribe to the channel!  MUSIC: 'Track of My Fears' by John Deley and the 41 Players  'Into the Storm'  by Elypsis Provided by Silk Music  DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our CJ account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
